General.Name: SEOHAN Const. & Eng.co.Ltd
General.Description: SEOHAN Const. & Eng.co.,Ltd engages in architecture, civil engineering, plant and electricity, and SOC businesses. It constructs apartments, roads, railways, bridges, and waterworks facilities. The company was formerly known as Daegu Housing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SEOHAN Const. & Eng.co.,Ltd in February 1982. SEOHAN Const. & Eng.co.,Ltd was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.

0.Name: Jong-Su  Jo
